00020 #include <sstream>
00021 #include "viewport.h"

00023 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00024 
00026 // A couple of very important functions
00027     void basic_w2b(
00028                    const Point2d& rmin, const Point2d& rmax, const double& x, const double& y,
00029                    const int bufferWidth, const int bufferHeight, int&bufferX, int&bufferY,
00030                    bool exception_if_outside)
00031     throw(std::invalid_argument)
00032 {
00033         double realWidth  = rmax.x-rmin.x;
00034         double realHeight = rmax.y-rmin.y;
00035         
00036         // u,v \in [0,1]
00037         double u = (x-rmin.x)/realWidth;
00038         double v = -(y-rmax.y)/realHeight;
00039         
00040         bufferX = (int)floor(u*bufferWidth);
00041         bufferY = (int)floor(v*bufferHeight);
00042         
00043         if(u==1) bufferX =  bufferWidth-1;
00044         if(v==1) bufferY =  bufferHeight-1;
00045         
00046         if(exception_if_outside)
00047             if( (bufferX<0) || (bufferX>=bufferWidth) || (bufferY<0) || (bufferY>=bufferHeight) ) {
00048                 std::string error = std::string("Point ")+RDK2::TextUtils::toString(x)+","+RDK2::TextUtils::toString(y)
00049                 + " is outside " + rmin.toString() + "-" + rmax.toString();
00050                 throw std::invalid_argument(error);
00051             }
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 void basic_b2w(const Point2d&rmin, const Point2d&rmax, const int bx, const int by,
00056                const int bufferWidth, const int bufferHeight, double&wx, double&wy) {
00057 
00058     int u = bx;
00059     int v = bufferHeight-1-by;
00060     double xcellSize = (rmax.x-rmin.x) / bufferWidth;
00061     double ycellSize = (rmax.y-rmin.y) / bufferHeight;
00062     
00063     wx = rmin.x + xcellSize*0.5 + xcellSize * u;
00064     wy = rmin.y + ycellSize*0.5 + ycellSize * v;
00065 }
00066 
00067 Viewport basic_cellBB(
00068     const Point2d&rmin, const Point2d&rmax, const int bx, const int by,
00069     const int bufferWidth, const int bufferHeight) {
00070         int u = bx;
00071         int v = bufferHeight-1-by;
00072         double xcellSize = (rmax.x-rmin.x) / bufferWidth;
00073         double ycellSize = (rmax.y-rmin.y) / bufferHeight;
00074         
00075         Point2d mmin = rmin + Point2d(xcellSize * u, ycellSize * v);
00076         Point2d mmax = rmin + Point2d(xcellSize * (u+1), ycellSize * (v+1));
00077         return Viewport(mmin,mmax);
00078 }
00079 
00081 
00082 
00083     Viewport::Viewport(const Point2d& rmin, const Point2d& rmax)
00084     throw(std::invalid_argument)
00085     : rmin(rmin), rmax(rmax) {
00086         if(!(rmin.x < rmax.x)) {
00087             std::string error = std::string("rmin.x = ") + RDK2::TextUtils::toString(rmin.x)
00088                 + " >= rmax.x = " + RDK2::TextUtils::toString(rmax.x);
00089             throw std::invalid_argument(error);
00090         }
00091         if(!(rmin.y < rmax.y)) {
00092             std::string error = std::string("rmin.y = ") + RDK2::TextUtils::toString(rmin.y) 
00093                 + " >= rmax.y = " + RDK2::TextUtils::toString(rmax.y);
00094             throw std::invalid_argument(error);
00095         }
00096     }
00097     
00098     
00099     Point2<int> Viewport::w2b(const Point2d&world, int bufferWidth, int bufferHeight ) const 
00100         throw(std::invalid_argument)
00101     {
00102         Point2i result;
00103         basic_w2b(rmin,rmax,world.x,world.y, bufferWidth, bufferHeight, result.x, result.y, true);
00104         return result;
00105     }
00106     
00107     Point2<int> Viewport::w2b_ani(const Point2d&world, int bufferWidth, int bufferHeight ) const
00108         throw() 
00109     {
00110         Point2i result;
00111         basic_w2b(rmin,rmax,world.x,world.y, bufferWidth, bufferHeight, result.x, result.y, false);
00112         return result;
00113     }
00114     
00115         
00116     bool Viewport::isInside(double x, double y) const {
00117         return x>=rmin.x && x<rmax.x
00118         &&     y>=rmin.y && y<rmax.y;
00119     }
00120 
00121     
00122     Viewport Viewport::grow(double percentIncrement) const {
00123         percentIncrement/=2;
00124         double w = width()*percentIncrement;
00125         double h = height()*percentIncrement;
00126         Point2d rmin1(rmin), rmax1(rmax);
00127         rmin1.x -= w;
00128         rmin1.y -= h;
00129         rmax1.x += w;
00130         rmax1.y += h;
00131         return Viewport(rmin1,rmax1);
00132     }
00133     
00134     
00135     std::string Viewport::toString() throw() {
00136         std::ostringstream oss;
00137         oss << "Viewport{Min-max: " << rmin.toString() << " - " << rmax.toString() << "}";
00138         return oss.str();   
00139     }
